__e: Yell louder, they didn't hear us.
Why are you surprised now that we got ourselves a vampire?
What you will all figure out is that vampires don't stand a chance.
You've come for some answers, and now I have a few.
I mean, do you know there's people out there that just want to kill vampires these days?
Said that when it came to killing vampires, you were the best.
I have a dream... To create a world where vampires and humans live without conflict.
The thing is, I've just spent the past few days with you learning about how much you hate vampires and what they did to your town.
Maybe there is such a thing as vampires. They're just different.
So how many vampires are there in this town anyway?
What part of "vampires" don't you understand?
So now you're sure it's vampires.
Don't you think we have too many vampires in our past to be sitting here, thinking of them watching us?
At a certain point, it stops being the vampires' fault that the town is like this... And it starts to be yours.
So, you're worried not because you'll be in a house full of vampires, but because you think they won't approve of you?
But there are plenty of vampires more than eager to take a bite.
No offense, but you're not the first vampire I've met.
